website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable option that provides light support and can be worn for long periods.
pros: Customers love that this is comfortable and adjustable, as well as that is can be worn all day without causing discomfort
It gets top marks for being sturdy yet soft and breathable
cons: Some felt the support was too light for their needs while others felt the overall design could be improved

customer_reviews.title: MUCH MORE THAN EXPECTED!!
customer_reviews.text: Much More Than Expected. I had a series of appointments with Physical Therapist and my should was fine for several months. Then as a result of not doing the recommended exercises, the pain came back. I still wanted to be active, so before mowing, I put on this brace. The next morning, I realized that I had not awakened in pain at all during the night and that I wasn't having any side effects from the mowing. I have mowed twice since then with the same great results. I will be 80 in less than a month, so this is extremely great news and results for me.
customer_reviews.author: nancy @nascar country

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use my arm while the brace supported my shoulder. I believe it really helped me to start to recover more quickly. I'm a small person and I was able to adjust it down to my size. Very pleased and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: kimki

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty comfortable as well
customer_reviews.text: I tore my rotator cuff and have been in a lot of pain. This brace fits very well and I wear it all night. It is the only way I am able to get some sleep. Its pretty comfortable as well. I highly recommend this brace!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Overbey

customer_reviews.title: WORKS FOR REAL!!
customer_reviews.text: 10X better than I expected. Many, many possible adjustments. This has helped a shoulder injury immensely. Don't take this wrong, but this brace somewhat limits rotation. The limit is what I needed to keep from antagonizing the injury. You can make this as loose or tight as your want, including the sleeve part.
customer_reviews.author: lautml

customer_reviews.title: BACK IN TRAINING
customer_reviews.text: I train Dobermans, and needless to say, over the years all the pulling from these dogs has taken a toll on my rotator cuffs. This brace has really helped. I wore it for a couple of days and everything has stopped hurting. I'm sure I will do something to bring back the pain, but this really helped immediately. My only complaint is that it is so bulky and hard to wear under clothes, and I know it will be way too hot to wear this summer in the Mississippi heat. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: cinderella

customer_reviews.title: purchased on December 29 2016 and is already is already ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased on December 29 2016 and is already is already damaged
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not really comfortable if your a bigger person
customer_reviews.text: Not really comfortable if your a bigger person. Material twists and tangles and becomes incredibly uncomfortable to wear and I’ve only had it for two days at this point. Also the Velcro comes through the material and stabs you with 100+ little plastic Velcroy needle like tips.. kinda regret getting this at this point
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hacia

customer_reviews.title: VERY flimsy
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! This "brace" is so lightweight and flimsy (less than 5 oz) that it provides absolutely no support for a tear. A sling does far more. Unfortunately, a sling hurts my neck, so I'm still searching for an alternative. This item is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: RetrieverMom

customer_reviews.title: Not one size fits most.
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to use it yet, as I have just had surgery and cannot lift/move my arm for 6 weeks. I wanted to put in the other arm, that is getting overused now, but I cant put it on with the immobile arm. Ordered product ahead, and now " return window", has closed, when I discover it is WAY too big for any womans arm. It is definitely NOT "one size fits most". Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: MaryRN

customer_reviews.title: nor does it look nice under my clothing well
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, this doesn't work well for me.This is so uncomfortable. I am a small woman; therefore, the brace doesn't well, nor does it look nice under my clothing well; I am expeted to look professional at work. The brace doesn't add the support I had hoped for, and it chaffs underneath my arms. I will probably return it and continue to searh for wht I need.
customer_reviews.author: Kwlly

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy unless you’re positive! So annoying.
customer_reviews.text: The brace is not good if you have a shoulder injury that may have bruising or sensitivity. It hurt putting pressure on my shoulder the minute I put it on and I had to immediately take it off. I bought it after an injury and knew right after I would unfortunately have to return the item... but now it’s not eligible for returns. I only buy on amazon with the ability to return just in case. So don’t purchase this unless your site you want to keep it. Mine has been worn for less than 1 minute and now I’m stuck with a brand new perfect brace that is just going to be thrown out.
customer_reviews.author: Brittny

customer_reviews.title: False advertising. Product photo does NOT represent what you receive
customer_reviews.text: The photo makes it seem like a standard compression sleeve like one might wear for an elbow injury. I absolutely do not recommend wasting your money on this product. The item I received was very loose fitting and covered in velcro straps. I was not able to get it tight enough to limit motion without being incredibly uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: eyesonlybob

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for my arm
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made and a good fit for my arm. Covers most of the arm nearly to my elbow. ( A different brace that I tried was too short to cover the area of soreness on my arm.) Velcro on the inside of the arm adjusts tightness and compression on the arm. It has an additional bit of material that protects the skin from the Velcro and from pinches during adjustment. Nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Returned It. Universal Size doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this after receiving it only 2 days back. I am a 4'11'', 120 lbs female and this 'universal' size is just not working. My chest strap adjusted nice and snug, the arm/biceps was good, sadly the actual area that should be supporting the rotator cuff and shoulder area was loose. So no support or relief. It was like wearing nothing around the afflicted region. It's a good product just wish they would make it to different sizes esp measured around the arm shoulder joint so it could actually support. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Ganguly

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome therapy regime for anyone with a rotator cup injury
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome therapy regime for anyone with a rotator cup injury. It gives great support and takes strain off of shoulder. I'm 6ft 3 in and 260 pds and it still fits my frame.
customer_reviews.author: moose

customer_reviews.title: Buyers Beware. Doesnt support unstable shoulder.
customer_reviews.text: Does not support my shoulder joint at all. If you have a chronic disslocating shoulder or unstable shoulder joint, then dont buy this. It provides no pressure in the area needed. It was also a tad bit too big, i was able to get it tight, but needed help to get the strap around my back. Even at the tightest it put almost zero pressure on my shoulder joint. Im 5'10 and 200lbs. Also had a terrible smell. I should have listened to the negative reviews. Wish I could give a zero star. Complete waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The body strap rolls up under armpit. That pulls the brace up under the chin and into the throat. The arm straps are difficult to adjust without help. And I have not found much relief from pain.
customer_reviews.author: julie greer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit...not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Not as pictured...thought I could slip my arm in to this with a bunch of straps by looking at the pictures. Not so. Arm has TWO adjustable straps...not geared toward women at all. This is the 2nd type of these shoulder braces I've ordered and again, now I know why these are shown on mostly male models...they forget women have breasts. So uncomfortable and HUGE...didn't fit my upper arm or sit snuggly at top of shoulder. The strap that goes under your arm is just as awful. Returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: indygirlinnc

customer_reviews.title: Loose brace no support
customer_reviews.text: The brace is very loose on the shoulder area providing no support at all, it’s a one size and it’s adjustable everywhere else except the area that needs to have pressure. Be careful before you buy it says this item is not eligible for returns and I didn’t see it until I tried to return it. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: It’s good for being unnoticeable
customer_reviews.text: I use this compression sleeve at least three times a week. It definitely keeps a low profile under my clothes and it’s not to over restricting. I will say, if you have sensitive skin then the material that’s used for this might be a factor, but it doesn’t itch or make me break out. Additionally what I really like about this particular slave is that it has a soft foam wrap around the end of the strap, so when my other arm is laying at my side it doesn’t put as much pressure and feels really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Siva Beharry

customer_reviews.title: My job is pretty strenuous on my body & when I exercise it ...
customer_reviews.text: My job is pretty strenuous on my body & when I exercise it feels a little extra sore in my right shoulder & bicep. I know a couple of ppl w/ shoulder tears & I'm not trying to get worse before prevention. This shoulder brace makes my workout feel totally different & now I'm way more comfortable than before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just a sleeve. Has 2 BIG velcro straps on the bottom of the arm!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our 14 year old daughter who plays waterpolo. The picture and desc look like it would be idea and could be worn during practice and maybe games. It looks like there wouldnt be too kuch to grab. By all the pictures and desc, it appears it is a sleeve that then attaches under the other arm. This would be coveres by her suit. However when we received this it has 2 big velcro atraps on thw bottom of the sleeve arm. This cannot be worn in the pool. It is alao obviously not really one size fits most. Maybe for a large man, it would fit. I tried it on amd it was huge. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hermesch

customer_reviews.title: Provides comfort/support; has a rubbery odor to it right out of the package (but still worth the comfort/support it brings)
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Shoulder Brace and it is providing some comfort and support for my injured rotator cuff. Here are my initial thoughts on the product after having worn it a few hours. PROS: * Helps provide comfort and support to the injured shoulder area (which I am extremely grateful for) * Acts as a good reminder for me as I am less likely to forget my shoulder is injured and not to make quick painful motions * Seems to fit me well (average build) CONS: * Has a strong rubbery smell to it (reminds me of that smell when you would walk into a SportsMart or SportsAuthority - what is that smell anyway?).
customer_reviews.author: Steve in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product for Stroke Victims!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased for my boyfriend who dislocated his shoulder while in the hospital after suffering a massive stroke. His left arm was paralyzed and basically just hanging. I would definitely recommend using this product immediately for someone who has suffered a stroke or arm paralysis even before their shoulder is dislocated unless their doctor advises otherwise. I believe it would have, at minimum, prevented the severity of his shoulder injury. None of the medical professionals recommended purchasing a support product like this but when they saw him wearing it to therapy said that it was great that he had it. I think it would have been great if they had recommended it to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STRAPS BROKEN after wash
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality material. within 12 hours of accumulated use I put it in the wash 1 time without putting it in the dryer and both upper and lower bicep strap tore apart completely... there was no heat and was on gentle wash for the skeptics. GIANT WASTE OF MONEY AND TIME READING REVIEWS THAT MADE THIS LOOK GOOD, DONT BE FOOLED. (side note) ...it did help with keeping form during workouts but unless you want to hand wash this or just let it rot. don't buy it. I would look into a different brand with stronger material or a more durable design.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Cendejas

customer_reviews.title: Works as recommended
customer_reviews.text: I had some inflammation in my shoulder and couldn't lift my arm above my shoulder. I had to wait on Physical therapy, so I gave this a try to hold me over. I was pleased that my shoulder didn't hurt as much as the end of the day when I was wearing it. It definitely did the job while I waited for the PT to start and the inflammation to go down.
customer_reviews.author: jstern24

customer_reviews.title: comfortable one.
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable one out of all the ones I tried. I have to wear a black tee shirt, long sleeve or short sleeve, but black, cause the black brace comes off on my clothes, even after washing... Other than that, it is the best fitting, it doesn't go across my boobs, thank goodness.. You can fit it not to.. It heals my arm 100% better than a dumb sling..Sling is Useless,....

customer_reviews.title: Product Description/Image isn't what you'll get
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment. I have a torn rotator cuff and was hopeful based on the description and the picture that it would provide support for my shoulder/arm. Not the case. The image isn't what you'll get, you will get a open sleeve not a closed sleeve and there are two (2) straps that even when fully pulled tight, there's no support at all. I would not recommend this product to people purchasing this to support medical issues.
customer_reviews.author: Squawk

customer_reviews.title: Got a bad shoulder/arm?  You must have this!!
customer_reviews.text: I took a "Superman fall" and partially tore the ligament in my right shoulder and have nerve damage in my neck and down both arms; pain in both elbows and hands. Whichever one is worse, I put this brace on and just "ahhhhhhh". It compresses the shoulder against the body and the pain is almost gone. It also rests your arm so the elbow and hand rest. You can use it on either shoulder. You want relief? Buy this
customer_reviews.author: Jeryna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brace for torn rotator cuffs!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Fits my needs having a torn rotator cuff. Mine is somewhat severe so the pain can only be alleviated so much, however, this brace is the best I have personally experienced thus far. Thank you. I will be purchasing a couple more just to have as backups.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS CLAYTON

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all for me.
customer_reviews.text: My first negative review ever. It fails to protect the very thing it's meant for: rotator cuff muscle. The velcros are covering the biceps and triceps. It's so loose above the rotator cuff when I lift my hands there are almost 2-3 inches of gap between the shoulder and the brace. They should have put a velcro which fastens across the rotator to protect it, just like other braces in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: RKumar

customer_reviews.title: Fully tightened it is still loose at the shoulder point. Worthless!
customer_reviews.text: This is a disaster! It is impossible to put this on alone. When I finally get the bicep and chest straps tightened so tight they cut off circulation, there is still no tension on the rotator cuff whatsoever. In fact it is completely loose in the only place it needs to be firm. Not only that but Amazon stiffed me when I tried to return it. I should have thrown my money out in the street for a less aggravating transaction.
customer_reviews.author: G. Cromeens

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on schedule. Not quite the support I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on schedule. Not quite the support I was hoping for but is helping. Uncomfortable around my lower neck. Thanks Larry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not able to return
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after I tried a different style that I had to return because it was too small. Was hoping that this would be work to help with my tendon issues in my shoulder but it doesn't provide any support to the front of my shoulder where the problem is. Would like to return it but Amazon said it cant be returned and offers no explanation as to why. I have only had it for a few days. Tried it one time and still have the original packaging for it.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Really helped my solder after a few days.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because at work I repeat the same motion with my shoulder all day. This has helped the pain of this repetitive motion. The only issue that I have with it is that the strap the goes under the arm becomes twisted and I have to adjust it many times during the day. But, I contribute this to the same repetitive motion that I perform at work. Overall I am very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Vandiver

customer_reviews.title: Stabilize the shoulder comfortably
customer_reviews.text: Great stabilization of the shoulder. I had an ac joint issue and needed something that I can wear comfortably without causing irritation, sweat and odor. This product does that excellently and I am located in UAE now, which is very hot and humidity is unbelievable, yet this keeps me comfortable with no sweat or odor. Highly recommend specially knowing that I am a big guy and I have always had an issue with finding something for my size, but this product fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Al Mualla

customer_reviews.title: Good product, gives reloef
customer_reviews.text: Tore my labrum in my shoulder almost 3 months ago. Even with a sling, the pain was still prevalent with movement. Searched for all kinds of things. Used KT tape for support under my shirts and it didnt help. I've had this product for 2 days now and can honestly say I've felt some kind of relief. Only reason it doesnt have 5 stars is after a few hours if it's not adjusted correctly, it will start to become uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: andru

customer_reviews.title: No as supportive as i thought itwould be
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a little bit more supportive and although it fits well and is adjustable it doesn't immobilize the shoulder as much as I had hoped . We deal with a lot of sports injuries around here and need a lot of braces. This is my 1st shoulder brace though so maybe I need to do more research into shoulder braces to find a better one that suited for me .
customer_reviews.author: texaschristina

customer_reviews.title: Not Effective
customer_reviews.text: Tried this brace because it was inexpensive. Have an injury involving the shoulder/Deltoid. Save your money, it doesn't work. Cuts under the opposite armpit (even tho it comes with a little pad) the arm cuff also cuts under the Bicep of the treated arm. But most importantly at the end of the day, it doesn't really stabilize the shoulder or provide any relief. Would not recommend. Would return but I tossed all the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: I would look for another option
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for several weeks and can finally give a full review. The brace does give a little pain relief by putting pressure to the shoulder but not much relief. The strap on the buckle side will roll causing it to twist and then start digging into your side. I am really disappointed that i missed my return window or would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: One size fits all?
customer_reviews.text: I just received the shoulder brace yesterday and have tried it on. I like the feeling of compression and support for my shoulder, but I don't think it really fits someone my size. I am 5 feet tall and don't weigh much over 100 pounds. The distance from my shoulder to the bend of my elbow is about 10 inches and the sleeve gets in the way of bending my arm. If I pull the sleeve up toward my neck to give my elbow room, the sleeve bunches up around my neck. I think a smaller size designed for smaller people would be a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Hauser

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL GAME CHANGER
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for 3 years. It is Absolutely Excellent. I had severe shoulder pain for a very long time. I now have Barely ANY PAIN in my shoulders. I bought 2 of these Vive Shoulder supports. I'd recommend them HIGHLY to anyone who wants to continue training and working out WITHOUT the Pain in their shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: RKL

customer_reviews.title: It gives compression but my problem is i am a ...
customer_reviews.text: It gives compression but my problem is i am a muscular man 6'3 -260ls. I have large shoulders and biceps and the straps around the biceps barely fit. I am using it for support with a rear labral tear in my shoulder. It does help but the straps are digging into my arms with the velcro. If i loosen it at all it will come apart, wish there was a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Metz

customer_reviews.title: This brace is great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this brace for my husband. He dislocated his shoulder and tore his rotary cuff in two places. Due to Covid 19 it is taking longer than usual to get surgery scheduled to repair it. He loves this brace. When he is not wearing this brace he cannot lift his arm without support from his other hand and the arm just flops when he tries to bring it down. He says it gives him much needed support and he is more in control when using his arm. He also says it is not as painful to use his arm while wearing it. I would recommend this brace.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McCray

customer_reviews.title: Helps with pain
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my sprained shoulder and when I put it on, it fit nicely and immediately made the pain feel much better. The compression in it definitely helps and it's not too tight either. The only thing is that it's really hot, but you can't really control that. I have recovered and I use it in the water while I wakeboard 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: jlo

customer_reviews.title: Awkward
customer_reviews.text: Very awkward and uncomfortable to wear. I had red marks where it was rubbing on my skin. When adjusting I had to cover my elbow with the brace in order for it to actually rest on my shoulder which caused it to slide up anytime I would move. If you have short arms this probably won't work well for you.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: So far this has proved to be a good purchase. The material is soft and has protection around the front buckle to keep it from digging in. I have worn it up to five hours at a time and it has eased my injured shoulder (hyper extension) and kept me from re-injuring it by giving support and limiting my motion.
customer_reviews.author: Coast Dog

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on and didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this you have to wear a t shirt under it as it will rash you and it made my arm hurt more....
customer_reviews.author: sandra brooks

customer_reviews.title: this company is rip off
customer_reviews.text: if you don't like this products and they don't give you a warning that if you buy from them they don't accept your return or your money back don't waste your time with this company biggest rip off and i did not have this shoulder brace less a day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is stated that one size fits all.  Comes only in one size
customer_reviews.text: The item is too big for me. Therefore it is useless to me. I have a complete tear of my right rotator cuff. I was not able to get surgery on it at the time of the tear as I had to have my right kidney removed. I chose to have the kidney surgery as my kidney problem was life threating. I'm planning to return brace.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret C. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: Sadly had to return because it was way to big for me. I am 5'1 and 115lbs. Really needed for my frozen shoulder but it wasn't meant to be. Placing my review only for those who are looking for something and are my size. I will say that it appeared to be made well and there are straps to adjust but it just wouldn't adjust to my frame.
customer_reviews.author: Tripti

customer_reviews.title: Not really useful for support when actually using shoulder/arm.
customer_reviews.text: It fits well enough, and but I don't feel any real compression or support. At most it seems to keep the shoulder and upper arm warmer, but that's about it. Maybe it's meant to keep your arm/shoulder from moving too much? But for any support when using your arm/shoulder, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Stevens

customer_reviews.title: This really works, reduces my pain in shoulder while sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I find this helpful for my shoulder pain, from a dislocation, when I sleep. It is easy to put on, and adjust. For me I find this really does reduce, and in some cases mostly eliminate, the pain I feel when I sleep at night.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Kinda stinky, kinda weird, not really what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: A Gawd awful chemical smell from hell made me want to immediately throw it away. I aired it out for a week before I could stand to have it near my face. OnceI started using it, I found that it puffs out on the shoulder part, and no adjustment will make it fit snugly to my body. An ace bandage does a better job. This thing is just weird. I gave it a 5 star for range of motion because it doesn't stabilize and your shoulder will do what it wants while wearing this ill fitting "brace".
customer_reviews.author: Jana S.

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay tight with full motion.
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay tight with full motion but does greatly help with torn rotator cuff. Mine probably a 9 out of 10 and this has helped greatly just wish it would no bunch as much as it does when you move shoulder forward. Only reason for 4 stars. elastic in the front so it could stretch would most likely take care of that..
customer_reviews.author: R K.

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small for 2XL man
customer_reviews.text: Was a little small for a 2XL frame. Had to get an extender strap, which the company sent out right away! Thanks! It kept the shoulder injury site warm, which turned out to be it's most helpful feature. It offered minor support, better than nothing, but it kept the pain level tolerable while working!
customer_reviews.author: healinghands

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I am a big man, but it feels like I need to grow up even more to had any compression on my shoulder from this product. Brace not providing any pain relief and very awkward to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Karpol

customer_reviews.title: This brace helped me to sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I hurt my rotator cuff. Getting pain relief and sleeping soundly was a problem. This simple and inexpensive brace has been a big help. Shortly after getting the shoulder brace, I began to notice improvement in my shoulder and a decrease in pain. Stopped taking over the counter pills to sleep! Very Pleased with the brace. I also bought a similar brace at about the same cost. In my experience, these work about the same and offer similar pain relief and shoulder support. I have no trouble wearing either one for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Your service was good and it arrived in good shape
customer_reviews.text: It did not help my husband's shoulder. He has had rotator cuff surgery and the shoulder gets to aching. I was hoping that this would help. I need to return the product. Your service was good and it arrived in good shape. It just did not help him.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Good support, velcro straps are slightly uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love this brace. I wear it when tendonitis flares up in my shoulder or when I know I'm doing arm intensive work. The support is really good when it is adjusted properly. It took me a few times to get the fit just right. I wouldn't recommend wearing it without something underneath. The velcro on the strap is uncomfortable and shifts around when you walk or move. I don't notice it at all as long as I have a shirt underneath. The arm velcro is slightly uncomfortable if it shifts off of my sleeve, so I readjust every few hours. Overall well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what was shown in picture
customer_reviews.text: The picture gave me the impression it was just a spandex type material sleeve that fits snug around your arm / shoulder, which is what I was looking for. I was looking for something that wasn't bulky and didn't hinder my range of motion so I can play golf with it on. The strap that goes around your chest has a velcro adjustment and I could see it irritating the skin. I would recommend wearing a tshirt under it. It also has two velcro adjustments at the bottom of the sleeve that aren't shown in the picture. Seems to help a little with pain relief but more for when you're not trying to be active.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Support shoulder muscles.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this brace for about two months now and decided to write a review. I play in a senior softball league and hurt my shoulder, and decided to try this brace. I found that it works very well. I also found that it works better if you wear a t-shirt underneath. It has helped me a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Simple, non-complicated support for my shoulder. Damage to ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple, non-complicated support for my shoulder. Damage to rotator cup sever enough to warrant shoulder replacement surgery but due to my age(71) decided against surgery. This gives me the ability to function almost normally. Enough to do the things a 71 year old man to wants or need to do in my daily life. With this on I can shave, hold my coffee cup to my lips and even comb my hair. All things I can't do with out the brace because all the tendons in the shoulder are detached. Only muscle in shoulder and arm holding everything where it is supposed to be, so the brace is truly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: BARRY SPADE

customer_reviews.title: Helps!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband due to his shoulder hurting. As soon as I helped him put it on, he noticed a difference! His shoulder barely hurt! He wears it almost everyday to work and at home! You almost need 2 people to put it on and fasten it for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: Save your money...Does Not Fit
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my wife who is having shoulder pain. She is medium size and this doesn't come close to fitting. It is loose at the top of the shoulder no matter how snug the straps--even to the point of the top piece pressing into her neck. Overall, bad implementation of a mediocre design.
customer_reviews.author: F Volker

customer_reviews.title: Not Great for Physical Activities
customer_reviews.text: I fight constant shoulder dislocations and have tried many different braces. For this one, I wasn't looking for a ton of support, but something that would provide good compression and minimal support. With this brace I received zero support. I should've realized prior to purchase that the construct of the brace doesn't allow for support. The best a design like this can do is provide some compression. If you have very low support needs this may work, but I wouldn't recommend for anyone doing athletic or movement activities.
customer_reviews.author: Dayne

customer_reviews.title: Really seems to help
customer_reviews.text: At this low price I was not expecting much. I had tried a brace at $150 but in was so uncomfortable it could not be worn. I wear this brace when I go fishing and it provides just enough support to do the job. It also keeps the shoulder warm which seem to help. A good item.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: One size does not fit all.
customer_reviews.text: I blew it and did not notice it's unreturnable...damn. The cuff cannot adjust to a small enough diameter for my arm, without alot of bulky and extra material pleated and sort of stuffed under the straps. The extra bulk made the shoulder fit not as it should be. The fit was doable and comfortable around the chest, underarm and back. I think the brace is made very well and would probably last for some time. I'm a female at 130lbs and it just doesn't fit well enough to suit the purpose of comfortably stabilizing my poor old impinged shoulder and bicep tears. So, smaller buyers beware!
customer_reviews.author: Dorene

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it doesn’t fit so it can’t work. I can’t return it so it’s a loss. I did measure prior to purchase. I should have just bought it at the drugstore where it would have been refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Filter14

customer_reviews.title: THIS SELLER DOES NOT ALLOW RETURNS!
customer_reviews.text: This seller does NOT ALLOW RETURNS! The product is made for a muscled man as far as I am able to guess. Even at it’s smallest the arm portion is way to loose to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: Janice abbasov

customer_reviews.title: Great For Limited Lifting Due To Shoulder Injury
customer_reviews.text: Back in 2007 I suffered an accident that left me permanently disabled. I fell and ripped my tendon and breaking my right shoulder bone. I tried to go back to work only to ripped again. I can be painful passing the salt at the dinner table. Searching through Amazon looking for a back support belt I came across this shoulder brace. I've been using it for a week now and it works perfect. I can't lift heavy but it protects me when I do lift light stuff or make akward movements with my right hand. I recommend it for lifting light or heavy stuff in awkward positions.
customer_reviews.author: BurtArt1

customer_reviews.title: Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Needs separate design for right and left shoulders to eliminate problems. Cannot get strap far enough away from my neck in the front and the sleeve must be put on first which creates painful adjustment if that can even be done at all. It also grabs onto clothing increasing unnecessary strain.
customer_reviews.author: Waterfall

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: It works great for me! It stays in place as I move about and I mean kickboxing and all that jazz! There are removable extenders that allows for a larger fit that I simply toss away because I’m small... and simply tighten with the attached Velcro. Works perfectly! Brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: MarleneS

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.......
customer_reviews.text: This compression wrap is working better than expected I have been having problems with a very painful, strained biceps muscle. When wearing the wrap it stabilizes the area and allows me more freedom of movement without pain. It is easier to apply if someone helps apply the compression, but is doable by oneself, if necessary. I have been quite pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: windsurgen

customer_reviews.title: Wanted something to fit more comfortably. I am 5'2" and weigh 165
customer_reviews.text: For me, it was too bulky. Wanted something to fit more comfortably. I am 5'2" and weigh 165. It didn't fit me well at all. My husband who is 245 and 6'3" who has muscular shoulders didn't like the fit. Sorry, Vive. I had to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: This does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This does the job. I have a partial tear in my rotator cuff and this brace helps stabilizes my shoulder and in hopes it will heal without surgery
customer_reviews.author: Karen D. Allmon

customer_reviews.title: The strap that wraps around the body rolls up.
customer_reviews.text: The overall design is good. The brace fits well. It does retain some heat, and in the short term my shoulder does feel slightly better. I have not worn the brace long enough to know how well it will actually work. The only noticeable problem is that the strap that goes around the upper back / chest rolls and rides up into the arm pit. This makes it uncomfortable to wear for extended periods.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoulder brace
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this long enough yet to see if it will be a true aid to healing, but I can say that it is comfortable, easy to use, and when I sleep in it I have less pain in the both through the night and in the morning. I usually take it off about halfway through the night because I tend to get hot, but even half of the night is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: CLS

customer_reviews.title: Velcro catches on clothing. Not comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't feel comfortable wearing this brace. I felt like I had to keep pulling into place and readjusting it. The velcro under the arm was constantly catching on my clothing. It was not comfortable under the armpit. Maybe it would be more comfortable for a man to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for a active injury
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it was my injury but my shoulder seemed to hurt worse with it in. It might feel better as a preventative support but not for a recent injury. I may have missed a link but instructions on how wear the support, how tight it should be, and how it should feel would also be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B

customer_reviews.title: Great product for normal sized people:)
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product 5 stars because it is a great product, it just didn't work out for me. It is a one size fits most product, and I am 5ft tall and 95 lbs... so I am not most. It came on time. It was packaged great and seems to be really great quality. I just had to return it because I was swimming in it, as I thought I might... but tried anyway for some relief on my shoulder. All in all, if you are a normal sized person, Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: K C

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to get on if you have limited mobility/pain in shoulder but fits my needs fine. It isn't all that comfortable as it wants ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast, support is decent. Difficult to get on if you have limited mobility/pain in shoulder but fits my needs fine. It isn't all that comfortable as it wants to lay across the nipple. If you try to get it lower, it rolls up and is still uncomfortable. I'm not as worried about that as it is difficult to get correct support with comfort on shoulder braces. The main knock off is a quite bad chemical smell. I will wash to see if this comes out, but it is pretty off-putting. If the smell comes out, it will still be useful, but not the most comfortable of braces.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: TOO BIG
customer_reviews.text: Oops. I did not realize this product was not eligible for return. When it comes to something you wear it is important to be able to return it. I suppose the seller knows this. That is why they do not allow returns. The shoulder part did not even come in contact with my shoulder. It did not give the support I needed for my aching rotator cuff. I won't be purchasing from Vive again.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: not suitable for exercising
customer_reviews.text: This is my third attempt at purchasing a shoulder brace. This one does not fit a woman's body. and it is not suitable for using when exercising. I found it difficult to put on. I figured out that I didn't need the extensions. Probably suited for a man's body.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: It helped me
customer_reviews.text: This helped me overcome frozen shoulder. Unfortunately I recently tore my labrum and it required surgery. Im using again post surgery and it helps for sure by supporting my shoulder while keeping the muscle warm. Also my doc was fine with me wearing it. My 2 cents
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: ... he was driving his truck it really hurt really bad this helping before him his job on setting up ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband he had pain in the shoulder while he was driving his truck it really hurt really bad this helping before him his job on setting up his trailers he still uses it that's a little uncomfortable sometimes on the side but it's worth it
customer_reviews.author: KIM BASS

customer_reviews.title: Smells like the inside of a new tire. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Tried on over a tee shirt, smell transferred to shirt. Can't wear because of the smell, and eye irritation. Put it in shed outside. Still had strong smell after 14 days. Very disappointed with this product. Apparently as a third party sale, I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Hadley1987

customer_reviews.title: Should is doing well 3 months down the road & sports doctor is amazed how well & fast it healed
customer_reviews.text: This cuff SAVED me from having surgery.... MRI showed fractured shoulder not torn rotator cuff but I am positive wearing this from two days after I fell saved me from having to have surgery. Should is doing well 3 months down the road & sports doctor is amazed how well & fast it healed.
customer_reviews.author: sue gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Its a bit tough to get it adjusted so your shoulder sits right. You will definitely need to have someone help you when you first adjust it. Also, the little sleeve on the chest strap to cover the velcro is annoying. Other than that, its a solid brace.
customer_reviews.author: Jay A

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't work for me and my injury.
customer_reviews.text: Have a permanent torn rotary cuff and this just did not help for me. Maybe exceptions was too high for what it might be able to do but will not hold bone tight to socket.
customer_reviews.author: James Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone keeps mentioning how comfortable this brace is, but I have to disagree. The brace is so stiff with some weird seams that create awkward points in the fabric. I tried washing it to see if that would help at all (also there was a weird odor) but it didn't help at all. The strap does have a lot of adjustable options, but I was never able to find one that worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nebeker

customer_reviews.title: I had a bad rotator injury but this strap was very helpful in ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a bad rotator injury but this strap was very helpful in securing my shoulder. the padded patch was annoying because it kept sliding up and down but overall, it was a necessary investment
customer_reviews.author: Philly

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was a way to tighten the upper arm
customer_reviews.text: received quickly and as advertised, sort of, it says it's for men or women and I have manly shoulders but I can't get this snugged down enough around the upper arm to do anything but billow out. So it doesn't really work for me but I'll keep it for my son he's got shoulder problems too.
customer_reviews.author: Sharie Breihan-Groot

customer_reviews.title: Good product but needs some adjustments
customer_reviews.text: In general I am satisfied but I think the product needs a little adjustment. At this point I am not sure how to improve it but the velcro on the arm portion should be more to a place easier to adjust. The strap tents to move and it needs to be adjust constantly. The idea is good but it needs a little work.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Poor buy
customer_reviews.text: Does not provide enough support or fit properly. Plus no returns allowed
customer_reviews.author: Linda Baunat

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is completely useless. You need two good arms to but it on and the it moves around while doing no good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Landis

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It came in short time and there was no chemical smell ( as someone wrote in reviews). It fits easily due to adjustable straps. I use it and quite helpful to ease the pain slightly. I say so because my pain in bicep and shoulder is due to fluid around bicep shown recently in M R I after getting vive. I do not hesitate to say that it is a good quality product and may be useful for those having pain in shoulder / bicep due to some other reason ( not like mine fluid around bicep). Thanks for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. I can work with it comfortably and sleep all night with very little pain. For shoulder combined with upper arm pain I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great support for shoulder
customer_reviews.text: This is an arm saver!!! I work at a grocery store and do a lot of heavy lifting and moving. This brace/support is great for the shoulder and arm! I put it on helps when I have overused my shoulder. I highly recommend to anyone doing extensive hard labor on a daily basis and needs support to prevent injury.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalGrl13

customer_reviews.title: I wear the brace while I sleep and it is helping me to have a good night sleep
customer_reviews.text: It works.... I am suffering from frozen shoulder,that's what I was told,I wear the brace while I sleep and it is helping me to have a good night sleep. I am happy.it would be perfect if snugs my deltoids.
customer_reviews.author: Palanikumar

product_meta.title: Vive Shoulder Brace - Rotator Cuff Compression Support - Men, Women, Left, Right Arm Injury Prevention Stabilizer Sleeve Wrap - Immobilizer for Dislocated AC Joint, Labrum Tear Pain (Black)
feature_bullets: STABILIZING THERAPEUTIC SUPPORT: Providing soothing, customizable compression, the Vive shoulder support stabilizes the shoulder to minimize unsafe movement, preventing re-injury and promoting quicker recovery times following surgery. The reversible shoulder support relieves pain, swelling and inflammation due to sprains and strains, shoulder dislocation, rotator cuff injuries, frozen shoulder and arthritis.

REVERSIBLE LOW PROFILE DESIGN: Suitable for both men and women, the shoulder brace is reversible for use on the left or right shoulder as needed. The slim design can be worn under regular fit clothing for a discreet look or worn over undershirts and tees if desired.

ADJUSTABLE FIT: Secured with a strong fastening system, the shoulder support is fully adjustable for a comfortable, nonslip fit throughout the day. The arm strap adjusts to fit bicep circumferences 8” up to 23” when using the included extender strap. Easy to adjust, the chest strap fits chest circumferences 27” up to 50” when using the included extender strap.

BREATHABLE NEOPRENE BLEND: Constructed with a lightweight neoprene blend, the shoulder support retains therapeutic warmth while allowing excess heat to quickly escape. The breathable blend is also machine washable for easy cleaning.
VIVE GUARANTEE: 60 day guarantee so you can purchase now with confidence.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
